org.jclif.type
Interface ParameterInput

All Superinterfaces:
Input
All Known Implementing Classes:
ParameterInputImpl
public interface ParameterInput
extends Input

Parameter interface defines the common methods of a parameter. A parameter represents the parameter value parsed from a command line input. A parameter can be either as an argument to an option or as an input to a command.

Author:
Stephen Lou Banal <stephen.banal@gmail.com>

getFileValue

java.io.File getFileValue()
Returns the File parameter value of an option. If option's parameter type does not match with the return type the value returned is null.

Returns:
File file value

getDirectoryValue

java.io.File getDirectoryValue()
Returns the directory parameter value of an option. If option's parameter type does not match with the return type the value returned is null.

Returns:
File a directory file

Returns:

getNumberValue

java.lang.Number getNumberValue()
Returns the Number parameter value of an option. If option's parameter type does not match with the return type the value returned is null.
